remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來自訂資料格的值轉換成適合顯示的格式，或自訂根據其狀態或值的資料格的外觀。Handle the event to customize the conversion of a cell value into a format suitable for display or to customize the appearance of a cell depending on its state or value. 每一次，每個儲存格繪製，因此您應該避免長時間處理時處理這個事件，就會發生事件。The event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event. 也會發生此事件時的儲存格擷取或其呼叫方法。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 當您處理事件，屬性會初始化與儲存格的值。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果您提供從儲存格的值來顯示值的自訂轉換，將屬性設為已轉換的值，確保新的值儲存格所指定之型別的屬性。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指出任何進一步的值，格式為必要，請設定屬性設`true`。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 值為何屬性中，所傳回之物件的顯示屬性屬性用來呈現儲存格。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 如需自訂格式化使用的詳細資訊事件，請參閱 < [ 如何： 自訂格式化 Windows Form DataGridView Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免效能的負面影響，處理這個事件時，存取透過事件處理常式，而不是直接存取的資料格參數的儲存格。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自訂格式化、 使用者指定的值轉換成實際的資料格的值，處理事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When
